title: VR Gamification Workshop for Creative Problem-Solving: Enhancing Competencies of Science Education Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education theory, practical experience, and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Elementary science teachers acquire creativity education methodologies using VR simulations and gamification techniques in corporate training settings

learning_goals: Apply at least three creative problem-solving strategies in a VR simulation environment
Develop science inquiry lesson plans incorporating gamification elements (reward systems, level-up structures, etc.)
Produce at least one creative project outcome through peer assessment and feedback systems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
